results.text: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
results.reason: The verse highlights the guidance and illumination provided by God's Word for our daily journey.
results.reflection: God's Word is our guiding light through each day.

results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
results.reason: Encourages daily reliance on God's wisdom and direction rather than relying solely on our own understanding.
results.reflection: Trusting in God daily leads to a straight path.

results.text: Give us today our daily bread.
results.reason: Jesus' teaching on daily provision and reliance on God for our daily needs.
results.reflection: Relying on God for our daily provision brings contentment.

results.text: Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. Each day has enough trouble of its own.
results.reason: Emphasizes living in the present and trusting God for each day without worrying about the future.
results.reflection: Focus on trusting God for today's needs and let go of worry for tomorrow.
